original_text: King David dedicated these articles to the Lord, as he had done with the silver and gold he had taken from all these nations: Edom and Moab, the Ammonites and the Philistines, and Amalek.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 그것도 여호와께 드리되 에돔과 모압과 암몬 자손과 블레셋 사람들과 아말렉 등 모든 이방 민족에게서 빼앗아 온 은금과 함께 하여 드리니라

sentences.original_text: King David dedicated these articles to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕은 이 물품들을 주께 바쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: as he had done with the silver and gold
he had taken from all these nations:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 모든 민족들에게서 취했던 것들을
